articles.description: Will Anthony Joshua learn from Tyson Fury's mistakes and make easy work of novice Francis Ngannou in Saudi Arabia on Friday?

articles.title: 'Confident, powerful, sharp' - how Joshua got back to his best

articles.description: Stephen Curry leads the Golden State Warriors as they bounce back from being "hit by a bus" to thrash the Milwaukee Bucks 125-90.

articles.description: Marais Erasmus will end his career as an international umpire after the second and final Test between New Zealand and Australia.
articles.title: Erasmus calls time on international umpiring career
